# [Interview #24: LOC Signing Report - Erica Sadun, Entry #9](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=24#9)

#### Robert Jordan

Girl at Citadel: "She is a liar. She and the guidance counselor deliberately whited out all references to her gender." (Followed by about 10 minutes of impassioned talk about how running in combat boots saved his life in Vietnamâ€”fascinating, touching and irreproducible.)
